title: Secure the Gold Dino Card and get Dino Green Card for free! ⭐️
description: Christmas Offer: Buy a the Gold Card = Get the Green Card for free (value 42 Dollar). The Green Card provides free entry on all open days throughout the summer season, including all dance and concert evenings!🎶
includes: Entry for the entire summer season 2025 ☀️
Access to all concerts on the Main and Small Stages 🎶
Access to all dance evenings at the Dance Pavilion 💃
